---
title: "Two New Lab Members"
description: "Sahrai Garcia and Zachary Kelly Join the PADLAB"
author: "PADLAB"
date: "07/17/2023"
---

In summer 2023, the Perception, Action, and Development Lab welcomed two new members. [Sahrai Garcia](/people/sahrai-garcia.qmd) is a graduate of UC Irvine and joined the lab as a research coordinator. [Zachary Kelly](/people/zachary-kelly.qmd) is a graduate of Louisiana State University and joined the lab as a doctoral student.
